TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProgressBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現具有視覺化樣式的進度列控制項的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a progress bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現具有目前作業系統的視覺化樣式的進度列控制項的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a progress bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該具有目前的視覺化樣式外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要繪製進度列，請使用或方法來繪製的空白列，然後使用或方法來繪製填滿列中的項目。To draw a progress bar, use the or methods to draw the empty bar, and then use the or methods to draw the elements that fill in the bar. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區，這個類別的方法將會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的進度列。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the progress bar with the current visual style. 否則，方法與這個類別的屬性將會擲回。Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個項目所公開， ， ，和類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the , , , and classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用的自訂控制項和方法來繪製垂直進度列。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a vertical progress bar. 此控制項會使用每秒重繪進度列，新增的片段。The control uses a to redraw the progress bar with an added piece each second. `SetupProgressBar`方法會使用和屬性來計算每個繪製過大矩形的高度。The `SetupProgressBar` method uses the and properties to calculate the height of each progressively larger rectangle that is drawn. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ChunkSpaceThickness { get; }
.property int32 ChunkSpaceThickness
Public Shared ReadOnly Property ChunkSpaceThickness As Integer
public: static property int ChunkSpaceThickness { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得進度列的每一個內部片段之間的間距寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets the width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

value.span: 進度列的每一個內部片段之間的間距寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。This value is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 存取這個屬性，您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before accessing this property, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷表示遞增進度列所繪製的每個矩形的大小方法。The following code example uses the property to determine the size of each rectangle that represents an increment of the progress bar drawn by the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

exception.span: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。This value is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 存取這個屬性，您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before accessing this property, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷表示遞增進度列所繪製的每個矩形的大小方法。The following code example uses the property to determine the size of each rectangle that represents an increment of the progress bar drawn by the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: The used to draw the progress bar.

span.span: Draws a set of progress bar pieces that fill a horizontal progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所繪製的每個進度列片段跨越的高度`bounds`參數。Each progress bar piece drawn by this method spans the height of the `bounds` parameter. 繪製的進度列片段的數目取決於寬度`bounds`和所傳回的值和屬性。The number of progress bar pieces drawn is determined by the width of `bounds` and the values returned by the and properties. 使用此方法之前, 您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

summary.span: 取得值，指出 類別是否可用來繪製具有視覺化樣式的進度列控制項。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a progress bar control with visual styles.

value.span: 如果使用者在作業系統中已經啟用視覺化樣式，而且應用程式視窗的工作區中已經套用視覺化樣式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`false`，方法與這個類別的屬性將會擲回。If this property is `false`, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷是否要呼叫方法。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to call the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
